expression: zip(cross_join(split(supplierIds,','), split(products,';')), '.', substring(split(regions,','), 1, 2), '.', substring(date('yyyy-MM-dd', deliveryDate), 6, 7), '.', (((qualityScore * qualityWeight + deliveryTime * timeWeight + cost * costWeight + reliability * reliabilityWeight + sustainability * sustainWeight) / totalWeight) > excellentThreshold ? (equals(substring(split(certifications,','), 1, 3), 'ISO') & carbonFootprint < '50' & ethicsRating >= '4.5' & insuranceCoverage > '1000000' ? '.preferred_platinum' : '.preferred_gold') : (((qualityScore * qualityWeight + deliveryTime * timeWeight + cost * costWeight + reliability * reliabilityWeight + sustainability * sustainWeight) / totalWeight) > goodThreshold ? '.approved_standard' : '.review_required')))
